edu.eur.absa.nlp

Class AbstractNLPComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.eur.absa.nlp.AbstractNLPComponent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CoreNLPAnnotationViewer, CoreNLPCorefResolver, CoreNLPDependencyParser, CoreNLPLemmatizer, CoreNLPNamedEntityRecognizer, CoreNLPParser, CoreNLPPosTagger, CoreNLPSentimentAnnotator, CoreNLPTokenizer, LowercaseChanger, RSTDiscourseParser

    public abstract class AbstractNLPComponent
extends java.lang.Object

      NLPTask getTask() 
      void process(Dataset dataset, java.lang.String spanType)
      This method first checks if this component can be executed, if not then stop.
      abstract void validatedProcess(Dataset dataset, java.lang.String spanType)
      After process() has determined whether this component can be run, it will call validatedProcess(), which should be implemented in each subclass of AbstractNLPComponent.

    • Field Detail

      • thisTask

        protected NLPTask thisTask

      • prerequisites

        protected java.util.HashSet<NLPTask> prerequisites

      • overwritePreviousRun

        protected boolean overwritePreviousRun
        You can set this to true in constructor to be able to overwrite a previous run. Do not use this for elementary components such as the Tokenizer.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractNLPComponent

        public AbstractNLPComponent()

    • Method Detail

      • validatedProcess

        public abstract void validatedProcess(Dataset dataset,
                                      java.lang.String spanType)
        After process() has determined whether this component can be run, it will call validatedProcess(), which should be implemented in each subclass of AbstractNLPComponent. This method contains the actual work being done.
        Parameters:
        dataset - The dataset to process
        spanType - The type of Span this component operates on

      • process

        public void process(Dataset dataset,
                    java.lang.String spanType)
        This method first checks if this component can be executed, if not then stop. Otherwise, refer to the validatedProcess() method of the actual component.
        Parameters:
        dataset - The dataset to process
        spanType - The type of Span this component operates on

      • getTask

        public NLPTask getTask()
        Returns:
        The NLPTask this component is performing

      • getPrerequisiteTasks

        public java.util.HashSet<NLPTask> getPrerequisiteTasks()
        Returns:
        The set of NLPTasks that have to be performed already before this component can be used
